In ordinary use, it usually refers to interpersonal love. Probably due to its large psychological relevance, love is one of the most common themes in art. +
'''Love''' has many meanings in [[English language|English]] from something that gives a little pleasure ("I loved that movie") to something one would die for ([[patriotism]], [[pairbonding]]). It can mean an intense feeling of [[affection]], an [[emotion]] or emotional state. In ordinary use, it usually refers to interpersonal love. Probably due to its large psychological relevance, love is one of the most common themes in art. The majority of modern [[movies]] have a love story and most [[pop music]] is about love.
